content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex 1 at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex 2 at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam
- Electrical network powering various entities

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5) for automation science pack production
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected lab for research
- Transport belt system connecting components

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in storage before attempting extraction
- Use inspect_inventory() to check available quantities
- Handle cases where required items are not available

### Assertion errors for insufficient materials
- Implement proper inventory checking before attempting operations
- Add fallback logic when required quantities are not available
- Consider adding resource production monitoring

### Entity status warnings
- Monitor "waiting for source items" warnings on inserters
- Ensure proper material flow between connected entities
- Check fuel levels in burner entities regularly
- Verify recipe ingredients are available for assembling machines

### Belt and pipe system issues
- Multiple empty belt and pipe groups indicate potential flow issues
- Ensure proper connectivity between transport systems
- Monitor fluid levels in pipe networks
